attributes.action: Ofqual should aid external students who are sitting their exams without a centre
attributes.additional_details: There are many students who are resitting their exams and if exams were to be cancelled, they would not receive CAG's. This will mean students will have to take another year out: which will cause students to be stressed. This is an enormous injustice to these students as many have worked incredibly hard towards getting their grades and refusing them would have a significant impact on the quality of their education and it would be a massive inconvenience for them to be held back an extra year.
attributes.background: Ofqual needs to help students who are sitting their GCSE and A-levels externally. External candidates were not helped during last years(2020) fiasco, this caused many students to become depressed as they were not able to get into university or college.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the impact of Covid-19 on private candidates, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
